description: This file defines an interface IMessageRepository in the namespace FrndAppBackend.Repositories. The interface declares asynchronous methods for adding messages, retrieving conversation history between users, and saving changes, indicating it is part of the data access layer for message entities.

classes.name: IMessageRepository
classes.description: Interface for message data operations including adding messages, fetching conversations, and saving changes.

methods.name: AddAsync
methods.description: Asynchronously adds a message to the data store.

methods.name: GetConversationAsync
methods.description: Retrieves a list of messages exchanged between two users, with support for pagination.

methods.name: SaveChangesAsync
methods.description: Commits any pending changes to the data store asynchronously.
